description: TASTE TRIFECTA La Costena’s range of salsas, sauces and beans means creating Mexican-inspired dishes just got easier and tastier. You’ll wonder how you ever managed without La Costena.
name: Chicken Tinga Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs La Costena Chipotle in Adobo Sauce, finely chopped
400g can La Costena Refried Pinto Beans, warmed
1 cup La Costena Chunky Salsa Mild
0.5 pkt 200g pkt corn chips, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook onion for 5 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened. Add chicken, chipotle in adobo sauce and puree, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until warmed through. Season with pepper.
Place beans in a microwave- safe bowl and cook, covered, on high for 1 minute or or until warmed through.
Divide beans over one-half of each tortilla. Top with chicken mixture and cheese, then fold tortillas to enclose filling.

Heat same cleaned large frying pan over medium-low heat. Cook quesadillas, in 3 batches, for 45 seconds on each side or until the cheese has melted and tortillas are golden. Cut quesadillas into wedges, then serve with salsa, jalapeño, if using, lime wedges and corn chips.
